recipes.title: Peanut Butter 'n' Banana Pudding
recipes.instructions: Directions                                                                                In a small saucepan, combine the brown sugar, cornstarch and milk until smooth. Cook and stir over medium-high heat until thickened and bubbly. Reduce heat to low; cook and stir 2 minutes longer.                                                                                            Remove from the heat. Stir a small amount of hot filling into egg; return all to the pan, stirring constantly. Bring to a gentle boil; cook and stir 2 minutes longer. Remove from the heat. Stir in the peanut butter, butter and vanilla. Cool for 15 minutes, stirring occasionally.                                                                                            Transfer to dessert dishes. Refrigerate if desired. Just before serving, top with banana slices and peanuts.                                        Yield: 2 servings.                                                                                                                         Originally published as Peanut Butter 'n' Banana Pudding in  Reminisce ExtraJanuary  2008, p53                                                                                                                                                                                                        Nutritional Facts                                                                             2/3 cup equals 565 calories, 13 g fat (4 g saturated fat), 118 mg cholesterol, 191 mg sodium, 106 g carbohydrate, 2 g fiber, 11 g protein.                                                                                                                                                                     Print                                                                                    Add to Recipe Box                            Email a Friend

steps.step: In a small saucepan, combine the brown sugar, cornstarch and milk until smooth. Cook and stir over medium-high heat until thickened and bubbly. Reduce heat to low; cook and stir 2 minutes longer.
Remove from the heat. Stir a small amount of hot filling into egg; return all to the pan, stirring constantly. Bring to a gentle boil; cook and stir 2 minutes longer.
Remove from the heat. Stir in the peanut butter, butter and vanilla. Cool for 15 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Transfer to dessert dishes. Refrigerate if desired. Just before serving, top with banana slices and peanuts.
